snippet.title: Parasomnia: No REM  -  Official Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Parasomnia: no REM is a first-person psychological horror game that explores a theme never before seen in this genre: sleepwalking. This theme is represented through the duality between reality and the sleepwalking state, and their interaction with each other. 

The game’s mechanics and environments adopt characteristics of this type of sleep disorder, offering both innovative and terrifying gameplay.

YOU CAN SUPPORT US RIGHT HERE:
